conbody.p: Oracle CDC Client originunsupported data typesYou can configure how the origin handles records that contain unsupported data types. The origin can perform the following actions:

ul.li: Pass the record to the pipeline without the unsupported data types.
Pass the record to error without the unsupported data types.

conbody.p: You can configure the origin to include the unsupported data types in the record. When you include unsupported types, the origin includes the field names and passes the data as unparsed strings.

The following Oracle data types are not supported by the Oracle CDC Client origin:
Array
Blob
Clob
Datalink
Distinct
Java Object
Nclob
Other
Ref
Ref Cursor
SQLXML
Struck
Timestamp with Timezone
Time with Timezone
The Oracle Raw datatype is treated as a Byte Array.
